title.rendered: Job at CMH Kharian Medical College CKMC in August 2024

content.rendered:
Job at CMH Kharian Medical College CKMC in August 2024. The CMH Kharian Medical College CKMC seeks applications from qualified candidates for its various positions in Kharian, Punjab, Pakistan. The opportunity is open to individuals who are passionate about education and contributing to healthcare.

Send CVs and cover letters indicating preferred positions to [email protected] The deadline for applications is 8 October 2024. We offer salaries starting from 30000 rupees to 45000 rupees per month.

Contact Us to Publish Your Jobs Ads At statesaga.com

Job at CMH Kharian Medical College CKMC in March 2024

Date Posted: 17 August, 2024
Last Date: 8 October, 2024
Category: Government
Education: Master, MPhil, MA, M.sc, MS
Location: Kharian, Punjab, Pakistan
Organization: CMH Kharian Medical College CKMC
Job Industry: Education Jobs
Job Type: Full Time

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024
  • NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024
  • Job at Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School and College in 2024

On August 17th, 2024, an advertisement was published in the daily Express Tribune Newspaper announcing the opening of the Combined Military Hospital CMH, Pakistan Army, and the CMH Kharian Medical College CKMC. The Kharian, Punjab, Pakistan campus invites applications for the positions of manager of student affairs, assistant professor, associate professor, statistician, assistant director, assistant professor of biochemistry, student coordinator, associate professor of biochemistry, and assistant director. Candidates with an MPhil, Master’s, M.Sc, MS, or MA degree will be preferred.

At CMH Kharian Medical College CKMC, several government jobs are available in education and other fields. By the newspaper advertisement, you can apply until the 8 of October 2024. Read the complete ad to find out how to apply for the latest CMH Kharian Medical College CKMC job openings online.

CKMC Education Job Application Process

Learn how to apply for education jobs at CKMC, from submission requirements to interview procedures. Learn how to effectively highlight your teaching philosophy, academic achievements, and commitment to medical education.
